test_cases.title: Successfully create test case with valid authentication and data
test_cases.description: Verify that a test case can be created when sending valid authentication and complete test data
steps: Step 1: Set valid authentication token in request header
Step 2: Prepare valid test case JSON payload with all required fields
Step 4: Verify response status and body
test_cases.expected_result: Response with 201 Created status and created test case details in response body
test_cases.preconditions: User must be authenticated with valid permissions

test_cases.title: Attempt to create test case with missing authentication
test_cases.description: Verify that the API returns appropriate error when authentication is missing
steps: Step 1: Prepare valid test case JSON payload
Step 2: Send POST request to /api/v1/tests without authentication token
test_cases.expected_result: Response with 401 Unauthorized status and appropriate error message

test_cases.title: Create test case with missing required fields
test_cases.description: Verify that the API handles missing required fields appropriately
steps: Step 1: Set valid authentication token in request header
Step 2: Prepare incomplete test case JSON payload (missing title)
test_cases.expected_result: Response with 400 Bad Request status and validation error details
test_cases.preconditions: User must be authenticated with valid permissions

metadata.requirement:
API Endpoint: POST /api/v1/tests

Description:
Create a new test case. Requires authentication. Accepts test details in JSON format.

Generate API test cases including:
- Valid requests with expected responses
- Invalid requests (bad data, missing fields)
- Authentication/authorization scenarios
- Edge cases (empty data, large payloads)
